pullRequest.title: Fix for DataTranslator where PegasusToAvroDefaultFieldTranslation mode throws unexpcted exception
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR migrated from RB: https://rb.corp.linkedin.com/r/196355
This is a bug fix when using the DataTranslator with the translation mode set to DO_NOT_TRANSLATE, the translator throws an exception for schemas without defaults
Related jira ticket: SI-14208
Tests:
(0) unit-tests
(1) mint build
(2) container wc-tests

nodes.bodyText: nit: remove space after the dot
You've said this is only for debug, but it's not actually used in the code you intend to commit. You should delete it.

I originally left this comment, which I'm still curious about.

Based on my understanding, this if-statement is just used to determine if the field schema was converted to a union. This doesn't seem to be consistent with the logic that actually determines whether to convert the schema field to a union.
